ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:13:09 [Issue ID 4000-154889] urn:comicvine:4000-154889
ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter 2 of 8 Cheri's night in hell isn't over yet.She has seen Citizen Pain. Like a demon in the flames, he trapped her and spoke to her. His voice was dark and sizzling, and it said that her life would never be the same, again. Cheri Major, some hero. She's plagued by nightmares, caught in politics and fending off the sexual advances of a smart-ass detective. For the first time in her life she feels as though she's lost control. That's too bad . . . because the VIOLENT MESSIAHS have only just begun to raise hell.
ComicInfo.Title: Book of Job, Chapter 2
